note: I've spent my career in technology and now lead a team of program managers at a cloud computing firm. I'm Chair-Elect of an international NGO focused on reducing the burden of malaria. In my spare time, I'm finishing up my MPH and working towards achieving CEFR B2 in French. My interests include planetary health, ecosystem services, negative externalities, complex systems, social democracy, and post-capitalism. I believe we're in a polycrisis and fear we lack a realistic path out of it.
